errors.name: UnauthorizedRole
errors.msg: Unauthorized: Missing required role for this operation

errors.name: PriceOutOfBounds
errors.msg: Submitted price is outside acceptable deviation bounds from oracle price

errors.name: BasktNotActive
errors.msg: Baskt is not active for trading

errors.name: RoleNotFound
errors.msg: Role not found for the account

errors.name: LongPositionsDisabled
errors.msg: Long positions are disabled for this asset

errors.name: ShortPositionsDisabled
errors.msg: Short positions are disabled for this asset

errors.name: BasktOperationsDisabled
errors.msg: Baskt management operations are currently disabled

errors.name: CollateralOverflow
errors.msg: Collateral amount would overflow maximum value

errors.name: InvalidBasktState
errors.msg: Invalid baskt state for this operation

errors.name: InvalidGracePeriod
errors.msg: Invalid grace period - must be between 1 hour and 7 days

errors.name: LeverageExceeded
errors.msg: Realised leverage exceeds declared leverage amount

errors.name: InvalidBorrowState
errors.msg: Invalid borrow state - borrow accumulated should be negative

types.name: AccessControl
docs: Access control system for the protocol

fields.name: entries
docs: Map of accounts to their roles

types.name: AccessControlEntry
docs: Access control entry for a specific account

fields.name: account
docs: The account that has this role

fields.name: role
docs: The role assigned to this account

types.name: AddCollateralParams
docs: Parameters for adding collateral to a position

types.name: AssetPermissions
docs: Permissions for the asset - optimized to use bitfield

types.name: ClosePositionParams
docs: Parameters for closing a position

types.name: FeatureFlags
docs: Feature flags to enable or disable specific protocol features

fields.name: allow_add_liquidity
docs: Allow adding liquidity to the protocol

fields.name: allow_remove_liquidity
docs: Allow removing liquidity from the protocol

fields.name: allow_open_position
docs: Allow opening new positions

fields.name: allow_close_position
docs: Allow closing existing positions

fields.name: allow_pnl_withdrawal
docs: Allow withdrawal of PnL

fields.name: allow_collateral_withdrawal
docs: Allow withdrawal of collateral

fields.name: allow_add_collateral
docs: Allow adding collateral to existing positions

fields.name: allow_baskt_creation
docs: Allow creation of new baskts

fields.name: allow_baskt_update
docs: Allow updating existing baskts

fields.name: allow_trading
docs: Allow trading on the protocol

fields.name: allow_liquidations
docs: Allow liquidations to occur

types.name: ForceClosePositionParams
docs: Parameters for force closing a position

fields.name: close_price
docs: Price to use for closing the position

types.name: LiquidatePositionParams
docs: Parameters for liquidating a position

types.name: LiquidityPool
docs: LiquidityPool represents the shared liquidity pool for the entire protocol
This is a single pool that acts as the counterparty to all user positions

fields.name: total_liquidity
docs: The total amount of liquidity in the pool

fields.name: lp_mint
docs: The token mint for the LP tokens

fields.name: usdc_vault
docs: The token account where USDC is stored

fields.name: lp_token_escrow
docs: The token account where LP tokens are held during withdrawal queue processing

fields.name: total_shares
docs: Total supply of LP tokens

fields.name: last_update_timestamp
docs: The timestamp of the last pool update

fields.name: deposit_fee_bps
docs: Fee percentage charged on deposits in basis points (e.g. 10 = 0.1%)

fields.name: withdrawal_fee_bps
docs: Fee percentage charged on withdrawals in basis points (e.g. 30 = 0.3%)

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump for this PDA

fields.name: pool_authority_bump
docs: Bump for pool authority PDA

fields.name: pending_lp_tokens
docs: Sum of LP tokens in the withdrawal queue but not yet burned

fields.name: withdraw_queue_head
docs: Monotonically increasing identifier for the next withdrawal request to append

fields.name: withdraw_queue_tail
docs: Identifier of the next withdrawal request expected to be processed

types.name: OpenPositionParams
docs: Parameters for opening a position

types.name: Protocol
docs:
* It should track all the assets that we have in the system.
 * it should keep track of all the fees we are charging and what not
 * it should keep track of min liqudiation margins
 * it should keep track of fee splits
 * it should keep track of owner and be able to transfer ownership
 * it should keep track of protocol level stats maybe? fees, trading, volume, total baskts, total assets

fields.name: collateral_mint
docs: Collateral mint (USDC)

fields.name: config
docs: Protocol configuration parameters

fields.name: opening_fee_bps
docs: Fee parameters (in basis points)

fields.name: treasury_cut_bps
docs: Fee split parameters (in basis points)

fields.name: max_funding_rate_bps
docs: Funding parameters

fields.name: min_collateral_ratio_bps
docs: Risk parameters

fields.name: min_liquidity
docs: Liquidity parameters

fields.name: rebalance_request_fee_lamports
docs: Rebalance request fee in lamports (SOL)

fields.name: baskt_creation_fee_lamports
docs: Baskt creation fee in lamports (SOL)

fields.name: last_updated
docs: Metadata

fields.name: cumulative_index
docs: Cumulative rebalance fee index (monotonically increasing)
Represents the total cumulative rebalance fee amount per unit position size
Scaled by PRICE_PRECISION for precision

fields.name: last_update_timestamp
docs: Timestamp of the last rebalance that updated this index

types.name: RequestWithdrawParams
docs: Parameters for withdrawal request creation

types.name: Role
docs: Roles that can be assigned to accounts for access control

types.name: WithdrawRequest
docs: Per-user withdrawal request queued when liquidity utilisation is high.

fields.name: id
docs: Sequential queue ID (monotonically increasing per pool)

fields.name: provider
docs: Requester (LP owner)

fields.name: remaining_lp
docs: LP tokens locked in the request (may be partially fulfilled)

fields.name: provider_usdc_account
docs: Destination token account for payouts

fields.name: requested_ts
docs: Timestamp when the request was created

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump
